name: CTRL Shift
description:
This is a topdown shooter where you will control a damaged ship.

Control type 1 - WASD to move

Control type 2 - W to move towards the mouse

Right mouse button - hold to shoot

Art - Leonardo Soares - @Raveroths

Sound - Vincent Colavita - @ColavitaVincent

Code/Design - Thiago Oliveira - @Thi_o_Oliveira
